txt.en: 'I have seen the totems the Ungoledain carve in the likeness of \qMam Murgwid\q; the face they give to the voice in their minds. I worry these are no mere statues, but perhaps a vessel for their foul magic. We should tear down those we come across in Cadar Skûs.'

'I have seen the totems the Ungoledain carve in the likeness of \qMam Murgwid\q; the face they give to the voice in their minds. I worry these are no mere statues, but perhaps a vessel for their foul magic. We should tear down those we come across in Cadar Skûs.'
'Thank you for humouring me, [placeholder]. Even if the totems are not conduits for magic, you have still removed their gruesome images from the world, a favourable outcome.'
Legolas has asked you to destroy spider totems in Cadar Skûs, for fear they may be conduits for foul magic.
'Thank you for humouring me, [placeholder]. Even if the totems are not conduits for magic, you have still removed their gruesome images from the world, a favourable outcome.'
You have destroyed many spider totems in Cadar Skûs.\n\nYou should talk to Legolas.
Legolas has asked you to destroy the Ungoladan totems in Cadar Skûs.
